sentences.en: " Now , stop crying, stop crying, let her cackle!
sentences.cn: 不要哭罢, 不要哭罢, 随她吠去好了!

sentences.en: But he was interrupted by a shrill cackle.
sentences.cn: 但他的话被一阵刺耳的笑声打断.

sentences.en: Cut the cackle, James! It's time you talked more seriously.
sentences.cn: 别闲扯了, 詹姆士! 该是你谈正经事的时候了.

sentences.en: Cut the cackle! Let's go right away.
sentences.cn: 少废话! 咱们马上就走.

sentences.en: He let out a brief cackle.
He that will have egg must endure the cackle of hen.
I cackle by occasion of the forwardness of others.
sentences.cn: 我因为其他人的鲁莽而咯咯直笑.

sentences.en: Let's cut the cackle and get down to business.
sentences.cn: 废话少说,开始干正事吧.

sentences.en: Never cackle till your egg were laid.
sentences.cn: 蛋未生下来,切勿咯咯叫.

sentences.en: She grinned toothlessly and with a cackle, spoke:'Now your third wish.
sentences.cn: 她露出缺齿的微笑喀喀笑著, 说: [现在轮到你的第三个愿望了.

sentences.en: The manager let us cut the cackle.
The young girl gave a cackle of laughter.
sentences.cn: 那少女咯咯地笑了起来.

sentences.en: We heard the cackle of the hen.
sentences.cn: 我们听见了母鸡下蛋后的咯咯叫声.

trans.tran_cn: （母鸡的）咯咯声，咯咯的笑声，刺耳的谈笑声，停止闲谈开始做事
trans.tran_en: a loud high sound that a chicken makes
to laugh in a loud unpleasant way, making short high sounds

trans.tran_cn: 饶舌，叽叽呱呱地讲，格格笑着表示
